newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - Howard hopes budget lifts business confidence.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - Howard hopes budget lifts business confidence.

text.p: Australian Prime Minister John Howard said after a fall in confidence ahead of his government's first budget, the reduction of the deficit and the prospect of lower rates should help rebuild small business confidence.

"I hope the budget will have a very beneficial effect," Howard said in a interview on television, responding to a question on when small business could expect to see consumers start spending again after a pre-budget slump.
"I don't think there's any doubt people have held off a bit pending the budget, that always seems to happen, particularly with the first budget of a new government," Howard said.
"Now that they know we've cut the deficit and set the scene, I hope, for better interest rate conditions, I think there'll be a lot more confidence in small business," he said.
